articles.title: Nick Jonas takes daughter Malti Marie for his London concert, shares new photos with Priyanka Chopra: ‘Her first soundcheck’ - The Indian Express
articles.description: American singer Nick Jonas performed in London's Royal Albert Hall, which was attended by daughter Malti Marie Chopra too.
articles.content: Actor Priyanka Chopra Jonas had shared on Saturday that her singer husband Nick Jonas has sold out London’s Royal Albert Hall. Now, the latter has shared pictures from the musical night which had the… [+1669 chars]

articles.title: Geologists Discover a Critical Kill Mechanism Behind a 350 Million-Year-Old Series of Extinctions - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A major oil source in North America reveals insights into one of the planet's most devastating mass extinctions. The Bakken Shale Formation, spanning an area of 200,000 square miles beneath parts of Canada and North Dakota, has been a prolific source of oil a…
articles.content:
ByUniversity of MarylandApril 15, 2023
